core: Developed automated test platform for advanced photodiode arrays

technical_ic.medium: Developed automated system for testing photon counting arrays
technical_ic.detailed: Engineered automated test platform combining optical imaging, electrical probing, and robust object detection for photodiode characterization

automation_engineer.medium: Created automated semiconductor test and validation system
automation_engineer.detailed: Designed and implemented closed-loop automation system achieving sub-μm precision for semiconductor device testing

research.medium: Developed novel approach to automated device testing
research.detailed: Pioneered integration of computer vision and precision automation for high-reliability semiconductor testing

reliability_engineer.detailed: Developed sophisticated error handling and detection systems preventing damage during automated device testing
